name: AI Hug Younger Self
template: Take a photo taken with a Polaroid camera. The photo should look like an ordinary photograph, without an explicit subject or property. The photo should have a slight blur and a consistent light source, like a flash from a dark room, scattered throughout the photo. Donâ€™t change the face. Change the background behind those two people with white curtains. Make it look like both people in the reference picture are hugging each other.
